channel.title: Agile Book Club Podcast
channel.description: AgileVentures.org panelists discussion on selected books and topics relating to agile development, team collaboration, and software engineering.
channel.itunes:summary: AgileVentures.org panelists discussion on selected books and topics relating to agile development, team collaboration, and software engineering.
channel.itunes:author: AgileVentures.org

item.title: Ep. 6: Agile Book Club podcast - Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories by Adzic/Evans
item.itunes:author: AgileVentures.org
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 6: Sam, Ashley, and Michael discuss the...
item.itunes:summary:
Episode 6: Sam, Ashley, and Michael discuss the following sections of "Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories" by Gojko Adzic and David Evans:
-Use hierarchical backlogs -Group stories by impact

item.title: Ep. 5: Agile Book Club podcast - Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories by Adzic/Evans
item.itunes:author: AgileVentures.org
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 5: Sam and Michael discuss the following...
item.itunes:summary:
Episode 5: Sam and Michael discuss the following sections of "Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories" by Gojko Adzic and David Evans:
-Put a best 'before date' on stories -Set deadlines for addressing major risks

item.title: Ep. 4: Agile Book Club podcast - Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories by Adzic/Evans
item.itunes:author: AgileVentures.org
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 4: Sam, Michael, and Ashley discuss the...
item.itunes:summary:
Episode 4: Sam, Michael, and Ashley discuss the following sections of "Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories" by Gojko Adzic and David Evans:
-Watch out for generic roles -Evaluate zone of control and sphere of influence

item.itunes:summary:
Episode 3: Sam and Michael discuss the following sections of "Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories" by Gojko Adzic and David Evans:

Episode 2: Sam, Michael, Ashley, and Matt discuss the following sections of "Fifty Quick Ideas to Improve your User Stories" by Gojko Adzic and David Evans:
